text: Scott Disick Home Burglarized Scott Disick's Hidden Hills Home Burglarized Breaking News 5 : 00 PM PT - - Law enforcement tells TMZ it's apparent items were taken from Disick's home, but they're not sure what was stolen because they have not yet spoken with Disick. Our sources say it appears the house was at least partially ransacked. And now we know why cops raced to the scene... there was a silent burglar alarm that was activated. As of now there are no leads. 3 : 08 PM PT - - Neighbors around Scott's home tell TMZ they did not hear an alarm go off during the burglary.
